text: Jorge Polgar (born 14 September 1967 in Montevideo) is a Uruguayan economist. Graduated at the University of the Republic, Polgar holds a PhD from Georgetown University. Since 2016 he is the chairman of the state-owned Banco de la República Oriental del Uruguay. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan people of Hungarian descent Category:University of the Republic (Uruguay) alumni Category:Uruguayan economists Category:Georgetown University alumni Category:Universidad ORT Uruguay faculty
title: Jorge Polgar
